## Parser.Maybe type

Turns `[A, B, C]` into `[A | undefined, B | undefined, C | undefined]`

**Signature:**

```typescript
type Maybe<T extends Array<unknown>> = T extends [infer Head, ...infer Tail] ? [Head | undefined, ...Maybe<Tail>] : [];
```
